answers.answer: Hey no one knows what happens every pregnancy is differentMine were all c-sections, but the first 2 nothing and the last (Nov 4 2004)  I had gestational diabetesDiscuss with your doctor what your chances are and go from thereTake Care

I had HELLP twice, my first bout during my 28th week, and my second bout at 35 weeks.  One of my OBGYN's told me there was a 27% chance of developing HELLp again.  Some women are lucky enough to not develop it again.

question: I had my first child (second pregnancy)in April 2004.  He was delivered by c-section at 37 1/2 weeks.  I found out I had pre-eclampsia and HELLP at my 37 week check up and was immediately admitted to the hospital and he was born the next day.  My husband and I are ready to try for our next on and my question is what are my chances of having this again and what are the chances that the severity of it will be worse?
title: HELLP Syndrome
